Passage: The film was released by Toei Company on 11 March 1984.[10] In Japan, the film grossed about ¥1.48billion at the box office, selling 914,767 tickets, and earning ¥742million in distribution income.[15] Question: What did Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind gross at box office? Answer:

summary: The film was released by Toei Company on 11 March 1984.[10] In Japan, the film grossed about ¥1.48billion at the box office, selling 914,767 tickets, and earning ¥742million in distribution income.[15]
question: What did Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind gross at box office?
label: ¥1.48billion
